instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALLATION: Run `yarn add framer-motion lucide-react clsx tailwind-merge` if not present.
2. FONTS: Add the Google Fonts link to `public/index.html` head.
3. STRUCTURE: Use `Layout` components to wrap pages. Maintain consistent margins.
4. QUIZ LOGIC: Ensure the quiz interface focuses on ONE question at a time with smooth transitions.
5. DASHBOARD: Use the Bento Grid layout. Do not clutter. Use cards with ample padding.
6. ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure all text colors pass WCAG AA against backgrounds.
7. DATA-TESTID: Add `data-testid` to all interactive elements.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text.
Avoid default 'blue' links. Use styled anchor tags.
Never center text in cards unless it's a specific 'stat' card.
